org.openimaj.feature.ArrayFeatureVector

  • Packages that use ArrayFeatureVector 
    Package Description
    org.openimaj.feature  
    org.openimaj.feature.local.data  
    org.openimaj.image.feature.local.aggregate
    Implementations of techniques that aggregate the local descriptors of an image into a single (typically fixed length) vector representation.
